item.description: Come and view this property and learn how they found it, funded it, financed it and their exit strategies... Mike and Jimmy Jordan Mike are natives of MA. They grew up in a construction family and remember being on job sites and helping their family as young as 8 years old. They've been personally investing over 5 years, are skilled in rehabbing, short-sales and buy and hold situations. They currently own about 50 units around the Boston area. This will be a fantastic event!

group.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: Rehab Tour with Mike and Jimmy Jordan
